description:
For focused workouts that yield results, you can't beat the consistency and accuracy of power-based training. And this unit is as low-profile and lightweight as a power meter gets – 15 grams, with a minimal housing and sleek front profile. You can expect wattage readings to be accurate within 1.5%. ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart compatibility make it good to go with pretty much any major GPS or cycling computer on the planet. Using a compact, easy-to-source coin cell battery, its battery life is over 200+ hours, and you can swap it out quickly without tools.

  • Comes pre-mounted to Shimano's Ultegra R8000 non-drive crank arm. Be sure to select the correct length
  • Compatible with all Shimano Hollowtech II road drivetrains
  • Same low-profile case as the previous version, with upgraded electronics for improved signal strength
  • LED indicator displays battery level at start up and confirms calibration
  • Fully sealed unit with IPX 7 waterproofing
  • Power is measured in kilograms via strain gages and mathematically converted to Watts
  • Active temperature compensation allows accurate readings regardless of weather
  • Accelerometer-based cadence readings keep your bike free of wires, magnets, zip-ties and other hardware
  • Specifications: accuracy: ± 1.5%, power range (Watts): 0 to 5000, cadence range (rpm): 10-220
  • Wireless firmware upgrades keep the unit future-proof
  • ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart compatibility
  • Software compatibility: Stages Link, Training Peaks, Strava, Garmin Training Center and others
  • CR2032 battery lasts 200+ hours and is user-replaceable without tools
  • Fits most bike frames; check Stages fit guide for details
name: Stages Power LFT Ultegra R8000 Power Meter
